授業目的: In this class we will focus on how to write an academic paper. We will work on the details and all of the elements of what goes into a graduation thesis including introductions, conclusions, plagiarism, citations and footnotes.
到達目標: In this class we will focus on how to write an academic paper. We will work on the details and all of the elements of what goes into a graduation thesis including introductions, conclusions, plagiarism, citations and footnotes.
